common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_01:
It feels like just yesterday that you were here for
your Gym Test.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_02:
Now you’re all Championed up and out doin’
errands for La Primera herself![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_03:
Tell ya somethin’: You get to be my age?
Time starts passin’ you by fast.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_04:
But that sentimental style’s not worth my while!
Time to kick a rhyme and hit the flow—let’s go![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_05:
My spirit’s burnin’—yearnin’ to get this battle
churnin’! You best be ready to begin![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_06: Our little Champion is comin’ into h[is;er:g] own...[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_07: Come on, baby! Rattle me down to the bone![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_08:
Hahaha! Wasn’t expectin’ you to rattle me
THAT much![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_09: You caught me off guard just like Shadow Sneak![npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_10: Sorry for callin’ you a rookie. Hope we’re good.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_11:
I just wanted to prove the strength of Ghost
types to Geeta, but I guess I got carried away.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_12:
You’re the real deal, my friend. I can guarantee
that.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_13: From here on out, Ryme’s got your back.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_14:
If you run into any vexin’ Trainers or hexin’
specters, you just give me a call.[npcn:1B]
common_2020_ghost_020_ghost_15:
Now you go enjoy this big, wide world to the
fullest, you hear me? Later, baby![npcn:1B]
